endProposalsRegistration().notice: Give the owner the ability to end the proposals registering process

endVotingSession().notice: Give the owner the ability to end the voting process and then the winner is setted and getWinner is usable

getWinner().notice: Give the ability to check which Proposal won the election

registerProposals(string).notice: Give the registered voters the ability to add new proposal

registerVoters(address).notice: Give the owner the ability to register new voters allowing them to make proposals and to vote

startProposalsRegistration().notice: Give the owner the ability to start the proposals registering process for eligible voters

startVotingSession().notice: Give the owner the ability to start the voting process

vote(uint256).notice: Give the registered voters the ability to vote for a Proposal according to its ID

notice: You can use this contract to create a voting process supervised by an administrator
